22.eng-name: The Book on Virtues of Jihad
22.ara-name: كتاب فضائل الجهاد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: meaning: Allah Mighty and Sublime is He says: 'The Mujahid in My cause, he has guarantee fro Me. If I I seize him, I cause him to inherit Paradise, and if I return him, I return him with a reward or spoils of war.'" [He said:] This Hadith is Gharib Sahih from this route

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الْجِهَادِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtue Of Jihad
